article.title: Northrop Grumman to Provide Processor for Naval Aviation Platforms
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Rolling Meadows, Illinois, is being awarded a $6,715,050 cost-plus-incentive-fee contract for the design and integration of the AN/APR-39D(V)2 processor using 6U card standards with the appropriate antenna and receiver resources for various naval aviation platforms.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
